summary: An accountant suddenly suffers from amnesia. This appears related to the suicide of his boss. Now some violent thugs are out to get him. They work for a shadowy figure known simply as The Major.
cast: Gregory Peck|Diane Baker|Walter Matthau|Kevin McCarthy|Jack Weston|Leif Erickson|Walter Abel|George Kennedy|Robert H. Harris|Anne Seymour|House Jameson|Hari Rhodes|Syl Lamont|Eileen Baral|Neil Fitzgerald|Franklin Cover|Don Anderson|Florence Anglin|Walter Arnold|Russell Baker|Bill Baldwin|Roxane Berard|Maurice Brenner|Jeff Brown|Robert Brubaker|Roydon Clark|Toni Covington|John Crowther|Robert Dahdah|Ann Doran|Jerry Dunphy|Douglas Evans|Edith Fellows|Harry Fleer|Rian Garrick|Gerald Gordon|Myron Healey|Philip Kenneally|George Lambert|Louise Lawson|Karen Norris|Bob O'Connell|Damian O'Flynn|Barbara Perry|Bill Quinn|Joe Quinn|Allan Ray|Walter Reed|John Richards|Pat Ripley|Victor Romito|Ann Staunton|Bert Stevens|Robert Swan|Aline Towne|Nancy Tribush|Howard Wendell
title: Espejismo
